telephony_line_tab_softphone_active_desc: If the switch is active, then this line can be used on all of your "Softcall" applications (mobile and computer) will no longer be usable on a fixed telephony terminal or on another softphone.
telephony_line_tab_softphone_inactive_de: If the switch is inactive, then this line can only be used on a fixed telephone terminal (wired or DECT) or on a softphone of your choice.
telephony_line_tab_softphone_activation_: Your Softphone option has been enabled/disabled on your line.
Unable to enable/disable your Softphone option on your line.
telephony_line_softphone_configure_descr: You can configure up to three devices in total. You can only configure one device at a time.
telephony_line_softphone_generate_token_: The configuration code could not be generated. {{ error }}
telephony_line_softphone_warning_token: Warning: this configuration code is only valid once. If anything goes wrong, it will need to be regenerated.
telephony_line_softphone_save_theme_desc: Any changes made at the line level will replace the group theme.
telephony_line_softphone_save_theme: You must restart the application for the theme to be active.
telephony_line_softphone_save_logo: You must restart the application for the logo to be active.
telephony_line_softphone_delete_device_e: Your softphone could not be deleted: {{status}}.
telephony_line_softphone_apply_logo_add_: Your logo could not be applied: {{errorMessage}}
telephony_line_softphone_apply_logo_remo: Your logo could not be deleted: {{errorMessage}}
telephony_line_softphone_apply_theme_err: Your theme could not be applied: {{errorMessage}}
telephony_line_softphone_delete_device_w: Are you sure you want to remove this device from your Softphone app?
telephony_line_softphone_delete_all_devi: Are you sure you want to disconnect all registered devices from your Softphone app?
telephony_line_softphone_delete_device_b: This action will make it impossible to use this device to make or receive calls through the app.
telephony_line_softphone_delete_all_devi: This action will make it impossible to use all devices to make or receive calls through the app. The SIP password for the line will be changed, and any new calls will be impossible without regenerating a configuration code.
telephony_line_softphone_download_links_: Install the Softphone application on your devices
Option 2 - For MacOS and Windows, availability on the blinds is coming soon
Option 3 - Copy this link or send it by email
telephony_line_expire_link: You can cancel by clicking here.
telephony_line_convert_date: This line will be converted into a number on {{ date }}.
telephony_line_convert_link: You can cancel in the next section.
telephony_line_mgcp_banner_description: The MGCP terminal used is deprecated: please replace terminal.
